::KitKat:;

She opened fire on Stronghold.  She ducked behind a tree and kept 
firing. 


- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Stronghold quivers under the shots. He turns around. Rizopas comes 
around in
> front of Stronghold and stares at Drillbit.
> 
> "Why did you shoot Stronghold?" He asks.
> 
> "Who cares! Let's just kill him!" Blender yells. His saw blade 
coming from
> his arm, he lunged at Drill Bit, slicing it in Drill Bit's 
direction...
